publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-529 Peter Peacock: Education (Additional Support for Learning) (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Education (Additional Support for Learning) (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Euan Robson*
